channel.title: Menus on The Radnor Arms
channel.description: Recent content in Menus on The Radnor Arms

item.title: Lunch
item.description: Lunch Menu Starters Homemade Soup(s) - Starter: £6 / Large: £8 Served with rustic bread and butter. Baked Camembert & Artisan Sharer - £9.50 Infused with rosemary, garlic and honey. Chinese Duck Bon Bons - £8 Shredded duck in a sweet hoisin sause coated in bread crumbs. Chicken Wings and Slaw - £7 Battered Calamari - £6 Calamari rings served with garlic mayo. Burgers All burgers are served with chip and slaw unless stated otherwise.

item.title: Evening
item.description: Evening Menu Starters Homemade Soup(s) - Starter: £6 / Large: £8 Served with rustic bread and butter. Baked Camembert & Artisan Sharer - £9.50 Infused with rosemary, garlic and honey. Chinese Duck Bon Bons - £8 Shredded duck in a sweet hoisin sause coated in bread crumbs. Chicken Wings and Slaw - £7 Battered Calamari - £6 Calamari rings served with garlic mayo. From the Pub Board Homemade Generous Panko Coated Fish Cake - £17 Made with smoked haddock, salmon, spring onions, cheddar cheese and potato, served on a bed of baby spinach leaves, chip and tartar source.

item.title: Sunday
item.description: Sunday Menu Starters Homemade Soup - Starter: £6 / Large: £8 Served with rustic bread and butter. Baked Camembert & Artisan Sharer - £9.50 Infused with rosemary, garlic and honey. Chinese Duck Bon Bons - £8 Shredded duck in a sweet hoisin sause coated in bread crumbs. Chicken Wings and Slaw - £7 Battered Calamari - £6 Calamari rings served with garlic mayo. Sunday Roasts All Sunday Roasts use local butcher sourced meats and are served with roast potatoes, roast parsnips, homemade Yorkshire Pudding, sage & onion stuffing, cauliflower cheese, and a selection of seasonal vegetables.
